org.wonderly.jini2
Class HttpServerInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.jini2.HttpServerInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Entry
public class HttpServerInfo
extends Object
implements Entry

This class is an Entry implementation that encapsulates all of the attributes of an http servers access.

Author:
Gregg Wonderly - gregg@wonderly.org
See Also:
